response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item carries a significant value of $15,000 to us, reflecting its quality, innovation, and exclusivity. We believe it could hold a similar or even greater significance for you. Considering its exceptional attributes, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This opportunity allows you to experience the unparalleled benefits and features that come with owning such a premium item. Should you be interested in exploring this offer further, please let us know, and we would be delighted to discuss the details with you.", "product_price": 14000}
